phrs.translation: 讲稿小搁台, 讲搞小搁台

sentences.sentence: Then the organiser talked for some time about special dietary requirements, microphones and lecterns.
sentences.translation: 然后会议的组织者说了一会儿关于特别饮食要求、麦克风和讲台的事。

sentences.sentence: Others will thump lecterns and call for banks to return to their “proper function” of low-risk lending to business.
sentences.translation: 其他的领导人则敲打着讲台，要求银行恢复其“真正的使命”：从事低风险的商业信贷业务。

sentences.sentence: Others will thump lecterns and call for Banks to return to their "proper function" of low-risk lending to business.
sentences.translation: 其他的领导人则敲打着讲台，要求银行恢复其“真正的使命”：从事低风险的商业信贷业务。
